member.name: M:VL.Skia.Imaging.TryFromImage(VL.Lib.Basics.Imaging.IImage,System.Boolean,SkiaSharp.SKImage@)
member.summary: Tries to convert an IImage to an SKImage
member.param: Skia cannot handle 16bit images. Therefore in case the input is of type R16 this decides whether to discard the higher or lower bits in the conversion to 8bit
The converted image or null if the conversion was not possible.

member.summary: Convertes an IImage to an SKImage
member.param: Skia cannot handle 16bit images. Therefore in case the input is of type R16 this decides whether to discard the higher or lower bits in the conversion to 8bit
